title: About Alan
content:
I'm an iOS Software Engineer from Sydney, Australia. I've been writing software for iOS for over five years for large businesses in Australia, as well as startups and personal projects. As a freelancer, I have been involved in dozens of iOS apps on the App Store — either as a developer or consultant. In industry, I have worked for MDM solution providers, mobility providers and currently for Yahoo Inc. I have written software for the enterprise; creating iPad–based retail installations deployed at retailers as far as New York! 
 
 I love design. My affinity for design was born after studying Human Computer Interaction. I design a lot of my software — this app was entirely designed from scratch! 
 
 I have completed a Bachelor of Computer Science and a Bachelor of Arts at UNSW. 
 
 I have been employed by UNSW as a Casual Academic, teaching Human Computer Interaction, Introductory Computer Science and Introductory Computing for Engineers. 
 
 I teach iOS Development at UNSW for free classes, and I have taught iOS Development in industry for General Assembly in Sydney. 
 
 I have picked a small handful of apps to showcase in this app — the great majority of my work in freelance is protected from disclosure. 
 
 You may need to set your device's locale to Australia to see some of the apps in SKStoreProductViewController.
